backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and admin‑gated article CRUD with publish control, using AccessControl and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list providing human-written summaries for each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining public and admin routes with redirects and layout/theme providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublishTog: UI control for publishing or unpublishing articles with loading states, error handling, and owner-only restrictions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Empty placeholder file for login button component.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder file for profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Admin-only guard that checks identity and admin status and shows an owner-access-only alert when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentB: Markdown-like parser that converts headers, images, bold/italic, and paragraphs into styled HTML.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentC: Article preview card showing cover image, title, excerpt, and date, linking to the article detail page.
frontend/src/components/editor/BodyEdito: Markdown text editor with image upload toggle and textarea input.
frontend/src/components/editor/ImageUplo: Image upload component handling validation, preview, progress, and callbacks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main site layout with header navigation, admin link, content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContent.ts: Admin-focused hooks for checking admin status and managing articles and user profiles through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentPublic.ts: Public content hooks for fetching published articles and individual article data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login flow.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing article list with edit and publish controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContentEditorPa: Form for creating or editing an article, including title, body, and cover image handling.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesListPage.tsx: Page listing published articles with loading skeletons and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContentDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article with metadata, cover image, and edit options for admins.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders a hero banner and link to browse articles.
frontend/src/pages/NotesListPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for listing notes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project scope: an article‑only website with owner‑only editing, image support, draft/publish workflow, and removal of all Notes features.
